data.text:
We had a fantastic time at Andaz for our Honeymoon. We arrived so early and weren't expecting to be checked in( guy on check in was so so good, can't remember his name unfortunately, checked in around 7am and was room 518 on 31st March). We got a room upgrade and my wife received a complimentary massage. The food options each day were top notch - never had so many choices for each meal. The staff were so attentive and were always on hand to assist you or help. The beach was so easily accessible and the swimming pool. The adult pool on the 14th floor was amazing - so quiet with great views and again amazing staff at the bar and to help you with the sunbeds. ðŸ˜€

We would highly recommend this hotel and hope to be back someday.
data.title: Fantastic hotel - Great staff and facilities.

data.text: I have been to Dubai a few times and stayed in the JBR area and this was my first time on the Palm. This hotel was really great. It was in an excellent location with the Nakheel shopping mall directly across the road and Club Vista Mare bars and restaurants right next door. There is a lovely sandy beach and if you want it a 5K beach walk from the hotel beach. Taxis were available all day and because of the location not expensive to go anywhere at all in Dubai. The hotel has two pools one large one on the ground floor level, suitable for families and one adult one on the 14th floor. I spent most of my time here and found it great, with comfortable beds a life guard and bar service. The hotel staff overall were excellent, nothing was a hassle. I was checked in as soon as I arrived and got a room upgrade. The housekeeping staff were great and very easily contacted for extra soft drinks and snacks. Reception checked in every so often to make sure everything was going well. I totally recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Dubai.
data.title: Excellent choice for a break in Dubai

data.text:
We arrived just after 130pm and our room wasn't yet ready. We had booked on a full board basis so were directed to the locale restaurant for lunch whilst our room was prepared. 
We were a little disappointed at the very little options for vegetarians. We asked if they had a veggie burger option which they did not. They suggested a Thai green veg curry which was not something we would have but tried it. It wasn't to our taste so was concerned when we realised we had another 4 lunches there! That night my husband asked if they could make a veggie dish but without the egg which they said no. There wasn't a great deal of options in the evening buffet. 
The next day we headed to la coco and was given a set menu to choose from which again wasn't great for veggies so my husband spoke to the reception team after dinner. They were very accommodating and arranged for the chef to speak with us the next day. The next 3 nights they made us food and even made our son fresh paratha everyday. They were so kind and really made our final few days in dubai great. 
The rooms are very modern and clean albeit a bit tight with a toddler and 4 cases / pushchair but we made do.  
The housekeeping didn't turn up until later on in the evening 5 / 6ish which at that time of night our son was napping so this was a bit annoying however we do appreciate it is more a city hotel so are probably busy turning rooms around ready for new guests. 
The location is great for the mall and monorail etc.
The pool was shared with other apartments / residences and we couldn't get sunloungers at all. 
The beach was nice but quite windy. 
All in all I think we were quite happy with our break but the fullboard situation wasn't explained on booking that you have a fixed lunch menu with little option. Although they did help us out after we'd spoke to them we probably wouldn't have booked the hotel if we had known. 
The locale staff and chefs  were lovely and a real credit to the hotel. La coco wasn't im afraid to say, the staff weren't really friendly and there was no real atmosphere down there.
data.title: Good city break

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We apologize for the initial inconvenience with the vegetarian options and the delayed housekeeping service. We're glad to hear that our reception team and chefs were able to accommodate your dietary preferences and make your last few days enjoyable. We appreciate your feedback regarding the lunch menu and will work on providing more options for vegetarians in the future. We're also grateful for your kind words about our locale staff and chefs. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with an even better experience.
owner_response.author: Andaz Dubai Team a concept by Hyatt

data.text: Located across from the Nakheel Mall, this hotel offers an unforgettable experience. Its diverse restaurants serve exquisite cuisines, while the serene pools and easy beach access provide perfect relaxation. Service is impeccable, with staff going above and beyond. A haven of luxury, highly recommended.
data.title: Amazing Hotel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you had an unforgettable experience at our hotel. It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed our diverse restaurants, serene pools, and easy beach access. Providing impeccable service is our top priority, and we're delighted that our staff went above and beyond to make your stay exceptional. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back for another luxurious experience in the future!
owner_response.author: Andaz Dubai Team a concept by Hyatt

data.text: Having first stayed at Andaz Dubai in October 2022, we returned in April and November 2023 and have just returned from our fourth visit but definitely not our last.  Each and every member of the staff we have encountered has been polite, professional and friendly and nothing is too much for them no matter the hour of the day or night.  We have been holidaying in Dubai for the last 18 years or so and in that time stayed at a few other hotels however, having now discovered the Andaz, I very much doubt we will stay anywhere else in the future.  It is an absolute delight and I can't recommend it highly enough.
data.title: Our Fourth Visit to Andaz Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your continued loyalty and for choosing Andaz Dubai for your stays. We are delighted to hear that you have enjoyed multiple visits with us and that our staff has consistently provided you with excellent service. Your kind words are truly appreciated, and we are thrilled to be your hotel of choice in Dubai. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more delightful stays in the future!
owner_response.author: Andaz Dubai Team a concept by Hyatt
